name: Chromadex Corporation
description: Chromadex Corporation is a leading global provider of innovative dietary supplement ingredients and a science-driven company that focuses on developing and commercializing products for health and wellness. Founded in 1999 and headquartered in Los Angeles, California, Chromadex has established itself as a pioneer in the field of nutritional science, with a strong commitment to research and development. The company is best known for its flagship ingredient, Tru Niagen®, which is a patented form of nicotinamide riboside (NR), a molecule that supports cellular health and has been shown to promote longevity. Through its proprietary technology and extensive scientific research, Chromadex aims to provide safe and effective solutions that enhance health and well-being. The company collaborates with various academic institutions and conducts clinical studies to validate the efficacy of its products. With a focus on quality and sustainability, Chromadex is dedicated to delivering premium ingredients and supplements that meet the growing consumer demand for health-oriented products. As the population ages and wellness becomes a priority, Chromadex continues to innovate and expand its product offerings, positioning itself as a leader in the dietary supplement industry.
